upgrades.name: Photo Booth Host
upgrades.description: Photo Booth Hosts really help bring out the fun and keep things moving quickly. The photo booth host would deliver, setup, and breakdown all photo booth equipment.

upgrades.name: Unlimited Prints
upgrades.description: Upgrade your package from 2 instant prints per session to unlimited prints per session. This upgrade applies only to packages with instant prints.

upgrades.name: Green Screen
upgrades.description: Upgrade your package from 2 instant prints per session to unlimited prints per session. This upgrade applies only to packages with instant prints.

upgrades.name: Props
upgrades.description: Upgrade your package from 2 instant prints per session to unlimited prints per session. This upgrade applies only to packages with instant prints.

upgrades.name: Instant 2x6" Prints
upgrades.description: Add two 2x6" prints to your package

upgrades.name: Photo Book
upgrades.description: Choose from any of our standard photo books.

upgrades.name: Instant 4x6" Prints
upgrades.description: Choose from any of our 4x6" print designs or use your own. This upgrade includes two prints per session.

upgrades.name: Extra Hour
upgrades.description: Add more time to any of our packages.
